page.title: 08Freshwater Around Tenbury 1
page.content: Brooks:_ Ledwyche Brook,Kyre Brook, Cadmore Brook,Bednal Brook. Ledwyche Brook runs into the Teme just by Burford House.Kyre Brook runs into the Teme in the Burgage.Cadmore Brook doesn't run into the Teme in this area.Bednal Brook runs into the Teme by Bednal Bridge. Rivers:_ River Teme. Ponds,lakes,dams and reserviors:_ Resorvior by Dunns greenhouses.Dam up by Cadmore Brook joins into a lake which is a trout farm.Sam fishes lower down from the lake.Some of Sam's friends go there to fish.Soon anglers will be going to fish there.There are also pike,eel,millers thumbs,stone loach.One of the most popular species of the place are frogs and toads. Sometimes the River Teme is low like Spring,Summer or Autumn but in Winter or Spring you get heavy rainstorms
